page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: This is an area of very{steep {hills}rising to over 350 metres in much of the South of the Block. The steepest sides of the hills are covered with{woodlands}- both conifers and mixed deciduous. The only area of{settlement}is in the small but attractive village of {Monksilver}in the North East Square of the block. There is a little community at the bottom of the steep and winding {Sticklepath Hill}who are often concerned by the number and size of vehicles passing their properties. Also within this Block is the historic and still very interesting complex surrounding{Combe Sydenham.
